As a maneuver, you place a magic sigil on a creature within 10 squares. When you place a sigil, you decide where it appears on the creatureâ€™s body, and whether the sigil is visible to only you or to all creatures. [[/apply h5HrY0cC4yFo2740]]

You always know the direction to the exact location of a creature who bears one of your sigils and is on the same world. You can have a number of active sigils equal to [[lookup @level]]{your level}, and can remove a sigil from a creature at will (no action required). If you already have the maximum number of sigils activated and you place a new one, your oldest sigil disappears with no other effect.
